post.body: I'll talk to mama about it. She's tired and cranky right now.
when's good for you? How about this weekend?
thanks! Merry Christmas!
What are you/?A radio station?
What's shakin' today?
How are you doing today? I see you are pretty free to Twitter at work. LOL
don't I know it! I recently got over a long ebb. Hoping to finish my latest betwen Xmas and New Year's with no work in the way.
How is the writing coming?
we'll see. in Missouri we say, welcome to MO, if you don't like the weather wait five minutes.
no prob, bro. How are you tonight?
good for you! Good for him! GO, Mr. Meogi!
is in Dallas safe and sound for Christmas.
Santa Claus bailout hearings! http://tinyurl.com/8qrys6
is doing the airport thing. Traveling to Dallas.
is back from the stores and ready to cocoon with the children for Christmas!
is wishing everyone a Merry Christmas Eve Day!
Woot woot! Christmas vacation at last!
is back to school for one more day. Christmas break starts at 11:45. Hallelujah!
is home. Called in sick today.
had a BLAST at today's Smerdiverse game. CHeck out the blog at http://tinyurl.com/787j8f
